asset_class_aggregation.rationale: Inventory draws in crude oil and strong gold ETF inflows are supportive, though a stronger dollar and falling copper prices present headwinds.
Dovish Fed policy and supportive credit conditions are the primary drivers. Small caps (RTY) show the strongest bullish signal due to high sensitivity to credit.
Policy divergence is the key theme, with the hawkish stances of the RBA and BoJ creating strong bullish signals against the dovish Fed, despite broad USD strength.
